review.author: DevOps (Codex)
findings: APPROVED — Phase C: IPC handlers + CLI script + integration test.
Reviewer traced full chain: CLI → WS → App → IPC → Investigator → Store. All contracts match.
Cross-model (Gemini): Runtime reachability verified. IPC wiring via registry correct. WS routing functional.
No blocking issues. Minor note: CLI uses 'add-hypothesis' command name while IPC uses 'add-assertion' — both accepted, just naming asymmetry.

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
